descAnti: If disabled, improves the game's performance at the cost of sharper visuals.
descFlash: Turn this off if you're photosensitive.
descSpeed: Adjust the scroll speed of the notes.
descDwnScrl: Makes the arrows go down instead of up.
descUnderlay: Changes the visibility of the lane underlay.
descHitSndT: Only works if the hitsound volume isn't at 0.
descHitSndV: Changes the volume of the hitsound.
descBot: If enabled, the game plays for you.
descMSDisp: If enabled, displays your hit time in milliseconds.
descMash: If enabled, you will get a miss for pressing keys when no notes are present.
ctrlResetGuide: If your controls don't work, press R to reset them.
ctrlGuide: NHẤN PHÍM BẤT KỲ ĐỂ TIẾP TỤC.
langSelect: CHỌN MỘT NGÔN NGỮ NÀO ĐÓ
langNotCompletelyAccurate: (Ngôn ngữ được dịch sẽ không hoàn toàn đúng 100%.)
noteColorGuide:
Use LEFT/RIGHT to change the selected arrow or the selected color.
Use UP/DOWN to change the selected color value.
Use ENTER to select a note.
Use RESET to reset a note's color.
tinyGuide: R - Đặt lại điểm bài đó // SPACE + R - Bài bất kì
